content: lion brand pattern # 70318ad skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® article #620 8 colors 1 ball each *lemongrass azalea pink burgundy sage seaspray zinnia violet sienna * *ed note uses less than 1 complete ball for each color good pattern for remnants from other projects or mix and match the color combinations you prefer * crochet hook - size i-9 split ring stitch markers worked in the round from the top down ear flaps and back neck extension are worked in row *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
